sentence.text: It is the Cinderella service because it mainly deals with powerless people .
The existence of powerless groups has been highlighted even by those who extol the virtues of the Japanese commitment to consensus .
Sometimes women are depicted almost as a caricature of a male stereotype of themselves -- they are servile , weak , powerless etc .
In the mining villages … can be found both deference and powerless resistance .
Hence , the powerful manager at work becomes the powerless driver of a vehicle caught in a traffic jam .
There is no point in raging against your circumstances if you are powerless to do anything about them .
The rock-climber is powerless to inspire respect .
It was as though they were creatures of the same species , possessed of a venom which might kill an outsider , but were powerless to injure each other .
If the Grand Theogonist is killed outright during shooting , hand-to-hand fighting , or at any other time then the Jade Griffon is powerless to save him .
Then she twisted her body until he was powerless beneath her , or so it pleased them to pretend .
Japan was powerless to stop her .
English Nature has been opposed to peat extraction but has been powerless to prevent it .
The Lebanese were powerless to control this conflict between Israel -- a foreign nation with which Lebanon was still technically at war -- and their own camps in Beirut and elsewhere in Lebanon .
Thank you for being there , for at this stage the Marshal was powerless to help him .
All I was conscious of was that everything had miscarried , and in my isolation , I was powerless to do anything .
The powerful surgeon in the operating theatre is powerless sitting in the dentists chair .
It 's something the Indians who live in the forest are powerless to stop :
Was there a supreme God , or was He powerless , subject to the machinations of a higher force in this universe ?
I felt powerless to refuse .
He seems powerless to move , except for his legs that thrash wildly with pain and protestation .

For a great many others , however , particularly those who made up the largely illiterate and religiously unsophisticated rural masses , it brought insufficient comfort and left them feeling powerless in the face of disaster .
I 'd felt powerless when I was abused as a child and I 'd felt the same powerlessness with the bank manager .
And the industry seems powerless to stop it .
She felt powerless as he brought up his other hand and let his fingers feather lightly down the side of her neck to her collar-bone .
They would be rendered powerless -- there was no way they could do anything with him .
Then abruptly I am back in real time , bobbing up and down in the river , powerless against its current .
I have already fitted high ratio diffs but the engine seems powerless at about 60-65mph ( no more acceleration ) so the idea of a 3.5 crossed my mind .
` When the Khabiri attacked we were powerless against them .
A child is a girl , is small , incapable of motherhood and comparatively powerless .
Local people ( who do notice and do care ) are virtually powerless to intervene against such a combination .
Countless people are appalled by what has happened to their capital city , but feel totally powerless to do anything about it .
In approaching institutions for help , the appearance of subservience can help people who are clearly powerless .
But if she let fitzAlan carry her off and marry her she would be completely powerless against a man who despised her .
Going along as a small independent with just a few programmes to your name does render you relatively powerless .
Logically such constructions should make ethnic minorities feel even more powerless than they actually are .
Each week At It will unlock the secrets of the gestures we all make and explain why some women are powerless after a well-timed shrug .
Michael Campbell , director general of RGDATA , the small grocers ' association , said his members felt utterly powerless when faced with naked violence .
Once again evil is powerless when faced with God acting through Jesus .
Theodore 's career reveals that even a good bishop could be powerless in a city where there were too many other interests . <ptr t=HY0CA00X>
